short_summary: Natural Resources Canada is seeking to purchase one ion chromatogram.
description: Purchase of one ion chromatogram to be installed in to the laboratory in Victoria.
duration_in_months: Il fully implemented the information travels the current year
full_summary:
## Ion Chromatograph Procurement

### Announcement Overview
Notice is hereby given that a proposed procurement [Amendment 7](#amendment-7) for the supply and installation of one (1) ion chromatography (IC) system has been released by the Canadian Federal Government, under the [Canadian Free Trade Agreement](#trade-agreements) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement. This procurement is addressed to all qualified proponents.

### Procurement Details

*   **Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**: CB-458-36443375
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) Against a Supply Arrangement
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional

### Supplies and Services Required
A single (1) ion chromatography (IC) system is required to be installed in the Analytical Chemistry Laboratory at the Natural Resources Canada’s Pacific Forestry Centre (PFC) in Victoria, BC. The IC system must be compatible with the existing IC system’s autosampler and operating software.

### Tender Details

*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 6, 2023, at 14:00 ET
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 1, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 29, 2024

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is Natural Resources Canada

*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E4, Canada

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:

*   **Contracting Officer**: Nadine Gudbranson
*   **Email**: nadine.gudbranson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: (343) 543-7068
*   **Fax**: None

### Supporting Documents
The Notice of Proposed Procurement and associated documents can be found on the Canada Buys website: [Tender Notice](<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20784/npp-5000076650--e60pv-19equi_0.pdf>).

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the [Canadian Free Trade Agreement](#trade-agreements) and the [Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement](#trade-agreements).
